QUANTUM COMPUTING

Q-300 Advanced Model

The Q-300 Advanced Model brings the power of quantum computing to those who need it most. Featuring the powerful Quantum-Tech 1250 processor, the Advanced Model provides blazing fast speeds. Perfect for power users, the Advanced Model from AlphaQuantum is perfect for advanced computing needs.

MSRP: $1699.99
Specifications
Processor QT-1250
Processor Series QuantumTech Series
Operating Frequency 152 Teraflops
#Qubits 75 Qubits
Motherboard ATX-5500
Graphics Card Quanta-550 Dedicated Graphics Card
Memory (2x) 40GB SuperPosition Memory
